body_html: Ohhh so previously it would just reassign AsStridedBackward that was in next_functions[0] to whatever was AsStridedBackward.next_functions[0] === base.grad_fn, which was an incorrect graph transformation (e.g. sizes don't match). Is that correct? That's not related to any of the leaks, it's more of a general fix, right?
body_text: Ohhh so previously it would just reassign AsStridedBackward that was in next_functions[0] to whatever was AsStridedBackward.next_functions[0] === base.grad_fn, which was an incorrect graph transformation (e.g. sizes don't match). Is that correct? That's not related to any of the leaks, it's more of a general fix, right?
body: Ohhh so previously it would just reassign `AsStridedBackward` that was in `next_functions[0]` to whatever was `AsStridedBackward.next_functions[0] === base.grad_fn`, which was an incorrect graph transformation (e.g. sizes don't match). Is that correct? That's not related to any of the leaks, it's more of a general fix, right?
